title: Not All You Need is Love
description: Drew, my college love, my first love. Sometimes not all you need is love to make things work. Drew was very different than me, he was a free soul that wanted to explore the world, while I wanted to be a doctor. I wanted a normal life; he didnâ€™t want to accept the regular path imposed by society. My romantic, beautiful and painful first love story that I find myself telling my granddaughter right now.
author: Daniela R. Morassutti
